attributes.action: make it a criminal offence to impersonate a member of HM Forces and "steal the valour" of any member of HM Forces for personal gain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To many people are now impersonating members of HM Forces for their own personal gain, taking advantage of the sacrifices that our Forces are making in Iraq and Afghanistan, for examle the sex offender in Scotland who is walking around pretending to be a member of the Royal Marines, whilst 40 Commando were fighting in Afghanistan, actions such as these are deplorable and should be made illegal punishable by a prison sentance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
